alert.note: Alert for Leon; Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 25 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Big Bend Florida, including the following counties, Leon and Wakulla. * WHEN...Until 615 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 414 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Crawfordville, Woodville, St. Marks, Tallahassee, Doak Campbell Stadium, Tallahassee Comm College, Wakulla, Wakulla Springs, Bethel, Shadeville, Leon Sinks, Vereen, Hyde Park, Eight Mile Pond, Hilliardville, Helen, Lutterloh, Arran, Lake Munson and Newport. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
